title: Hornets Unveil New City Edition Uniform For 2024-25 Season - NBA.com
description: The Charlotte Hornets today unveiled a new Nike NBA City Edition uniform to be worn during the 2024-25 NBA season. With a mint green silhouette, and granite and gold accents, the uniform is a continuation of the story of the first-ever U.S. Mint – which was established in Charlotte following the Carolina Gold Rush of the early 1800s – and is the final chapter of the Charlotte Hornets City Edition Minted Uniform series that was introduced in 2020-21.
